about_the_game:
BARRACKS Simulator offers gameplay that requires both strategy and discipline. Players' communication skills, leadership abilities and sense of justice are at the center of the game. Each of your decisions can affect the success and reputation of your unit.


Game Features



  • Rank System: Each player has duties and responsibilities appropriate to their rank. Lower ranks take orders, while higher ranks give instructions and organize their team.
    [Realistic Interaction: In the game you have to treat different people according to your rank. It is important to stick to the chain of command.

  • Vehicle and Equipment Utilization: Participate in military operations by playing with tanks, military vehicles and other equipment. Vehicle use plays a critical role in special missions.

  • Delegating Tasks and Instructions: As a team leader, you can give orders or carry them out in lower ranks. Missions require disciplined cooperation.

  • Arrest and Justice Mechanism: Players can arrest, interrogate or neutralize each other in combat situations. However, when a player is killed, a military tribunal is activated.

  • Military Tribunal and Justice System: When a player is killed in-game, a court-martial is held and charges are heard. Defendants and witnesses testify. Justice is decided by player votes, which increases both the tension and social interaction of the game.


Get ready to experience the dynamism of military life with your friends and make the decisions that your responsibility demands. An experience full of discipline, conflict and justice awaits you!





Barracks Simulator is a military-themed, co-op role-playing game that offers players a unique experience. Playing with your friends, you will be part of a military base, facing a variety of missions and authorizations according to rank.
